title: Kings of sport
creator_credit: Arthur C. Stevens and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: Introducing twenty five years of sporting champions, including; Henry Seagrove on land and water; Donald Campbell’s land speed record; John Cobb; TT Races on the Isle of Man; Fred Perry at Wimbledon; Henry Cotton the golfer; Denis Compton and Donald Bradman at cricket.
